[h2] Boy, oh, boy, where do I start with this one... [/h2]
[i]This game is quite fascinating as whole to me.[/i]
[b]Graphics are good, if[/b] you have a high-end PC or [b]know how to optimise the game[/b] well, matchmaking servers run 64 tic so [b]no mirage window smokes from spawn for you[/b], but besides that the game is enjoyable.
I find the moments with [b]multilingual people the best[/b] though, they could speak Russian or English, French or German and possibly even Brazilian [u](any language really!)[/u]. And when you have a team with 2 Russian squeaker, an old English man and a German woman [u](this is a possible example of a diversity of people you could encounter!)[/u], communication is key for the victory, this is where [u]knowing multiple languages[/u] shines. You can step in and turn the tide of battle around, call some 'strats' and [i]curl the game around your little finger[/i] and you win, because you, you could express yourself to multiple people and they followed you.
[spoiler][b](WARNING: this is a hypothetical scenario that you will probably never encounter, but dreaming is good, isn't it?)[/b][/spoiler]
[i][b]That is what i love about this Counter-Strike, finding so much vastly different people, and yet, somehow managing to all work together to achieve a common goal, truly brilliant![/b][/i]
